title: The Great Wall of China
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 557 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 730L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     V and Z1
description: For thousands of years, Chinese emperors built the Great Wall by adding more and more sections, making it a fascinating look into the country's long history. Readers will learn about why this wonder was built as well as the different types of construction used.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
